channel.title: Tips for counter-strike?
channel.description:
Well, I suck really bad. I get like about .75 kills every round, so, 1/4 of the time, in one round, i don't get a kill, and usually get one kill every now and then.
But where should I aim?
What should I buy?
Thanks

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

BTW, don’t silencer, it decreases range.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

dont move while shooting, it increases recoil.
when trying to shoot someone far away, crouching increases your aim

Read full topic

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

I usually buy / ak, deagle, kelvar + helmet, HE grenade and 2 flashbangs.

Don’t run off by yourself, try and stay with a few of your team mates, as if you’re outnumbered, you’ll probably get raped. Learn the maps you’re playing on, learn the routes to go etc, so you know where enemies will be, and so you won’t get taken by surprise.

Don’t try and run and shoot, as your bullets will be all over. Also try and burst, not spray, as your bullets start spreading about more due to recoil etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:

[quote=“Man UTD Freak, post:24, topic:272817”][quote author=Cruzer link=topic=360114.msg2748103#msg2748103 date=1239746271]

Wrauld isn’t your steam name, it’s not found.
DM is terrible to teach you how to play because you can just rush into the action, get a kill and die.
You don’t learn how to not get killed.

My steam name? Will my steam id work? Because, I thought your login into the site was only to be used to acsess there site…

I do not wish to give out my steam username, because members will make fun of the name.

then why make it something stupid…?
[/quote]

What’s done has already been done. He probably didn’t anticipate giving out the user name when he made it in the 1st place.[/quote]
Yup =/, I thought that wasn’t really going to be needed for people to be friends with you. I guess I will pm you it later but…atm, idk.

I guess I will PM you it if your really want it.

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

How I warm up.
1st round- Tap my mouse
2nd -5th round Spray/Tap choose either one.
6th+ Burst (Hold the trigger for like 3 shots)
Thats how I warm up wen I’m about to play source. 1.6 is a different story though.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

always aim for the head, of course if its a gun with a lot of recoil like ak you should aim a bit lower and never fire more than 1-3 shots consecutively

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:17, topic:272817”][quote author=Wrauld link=topic=360114.msg2745875#msg2745875 date=1239629400]
Whats the servers I.P and port? (sounds like moparscae =/) I’ll add it to my favorites.
[/quote]

type in gg in your filter to bring up all the gg servers

gun game is where you start off with a gun and you have to get a kill with it before you go to the next. there are a few different orders but most start with rifles and smgs, then eventually get to pistols, nade then knife. first one to get a knife kill wins.

mostly smaller maps = fast rounds + you learn how to use every gun.

another fun map is scoutzknives, but most of the servers are shit because they turn the gravity way down.[/quote]
oh lol, Wrauld, is my steam name I’m pretty sure btw.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

ooh, Daed thanks for reminding me. I said SMG, I meant MP5 Navy, that’s a really good gun for beginners.

You should’ve gotten 1.6 first. 1.6 makes Source look like a cakewalk. I play a couple rounds of 1.6, and then go to source and I destroy in Source.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @Daed Daed
item.description:
@Daed wrote:

When your low on money, grab either a pistol (Deagle for me) or the mp5, its really accurate even though it doesn’t do so much damage, so just spray at the head and you will get headshots like mad.

In a normal round pick up a gun like the m4/ak47 and try not to spray, shoot 1-3 bullets then move and shoot another 1-3, never shoot while your moving because all your bullets will go everywhere

Add me on steam

Shellmodule

Read full topic

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:9, topic:272817”][quote author=Wrauld link=topic=360114.msg2745432#msg2745432 date=1239591454]

if you’re playing with pro’s it’ll be hard to learn, unless they help to teach you.

Which is highly unlikely.

their pros to me :(, they headshot me so fast, and so easily :(, but, when I camp, and have good cover, I get a lot of kills, but I still go negative.

I’m doing death match atm, to help me aim better, etc,.
[/quote]

Don’t camp.

Don’t be afraid to jump into the action. I don’t play cs but if your always hiding in fps games, you’re gonna suck.[/quote]
Yup, I know. But, when I did ThAt0n36Uy tips, it helped a lot.[quote=“Original Daniel, post:10, topic:272817”]play gungame[/quote]
Whats the servers I.P and port? (sounds like moparscae =/) I’ll add it to my favorites.

item.title: Tips for counter-strike?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Do everything said above. Aim for the torso, chest area. Play with people that are in your skill range, if you’re playing with pro’s it’ll be hard to learn, unless they help to teach you. Use the M16, with a silencer, and fire in 3-4 shot bursts. Or you can start with the SMG, SMG might be the best for you to start out with.

Strafing really helps with aiming, youtube it, if you strafe about 2-3 feet left and right, and burst everytime you stop strafing it’ll make your crosshair shrink, and help you hit targets farther away. Walking is also very helpful for precision shooting. Crouching too, but crouching can be dangerous.

The goal should be to get the most kills, but to die the least. If you get 4 kills and 1 death. Imo that’s a good game. 20 kills, 20 deaths is awful. Like a recent game I got about 36k/8d. Which is OK.

Read full topic
